name: Dig the Onion (Votre Pseudo)
description:
### Ya want to slice da onion to make a delicious onion tart but it will make ya cry all the tears of yar body...

### Controls

* __Mouse:__ left click to drag cards and press buttons

### Softwares & ressources

* Unity & Visual Studio

* Krita

* Tracktion Waveform & Audacity

* Font: https://www.dafont.com/fr/schoolwork.font

### Credits

Video game made for Ludum Dare 48!

* Coding, implementation & game design: Vivien

* Drawings, animations & shaders: Emilie

* Sounds, music, drawings, animations & game design: Laurent

_Thanks for playing! Feel free to leave a feedback ☺_
